attributes.additional_details: NHS to have more of an up to date understanding of the thyroid condition, as each patient symptoms are different. GPs to be more updated with this condition and to take on board other symptoms the patient is telling the GP, and not keep saying to the patient your results are in the parameters, who's ? all areas test different and not same results ,also to change the level of results, so all are treated from borderline onwards, and not left to wait to see if it gets worse, and this to include all tests associated with the condition including seeing a thyroid specialist not just relying on the TSH test.
